name: His Way
goal:
Stimulating sustainable growth of organisations, companies and brands by increasing their perceived value and degree of irreplaceability. Identifying the blockages and deficiencies slowing their growth and developing practical solutions that will overcome these.

Content Marketing solutions and strategies.

Allowing organisations to discover uniquely effective tools that facilitate their operations and help them reach their ambitious objectives. Effectively and measurably.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020, sme, innovation, agriculture, development, content management, document curation
customers: Athens Technology Center,Press Club Brussels Europe
